AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: agents who have noticed drop-offs on Farm-to-Market Road 2050 and are involved in monitoring traffic at the Freer immigration checkpoint
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.white Malibu sedan: vehicle involved in a case where it was determined to be driving in tandem with a black Dodge truck and exited off Highway 59 onto Farm-to-Market Road 2050
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.black Dodge truck: vehicle involved in a case where it was determined to be driving in tandem with a white Malibu sedan
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: road frequently used for drop-offs of illegal aliens to avoid checkpoints and adjacent to the Border Patrol station parking lot
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer immigration checkpoint: checkpoint on Highway 59 that smugglers try to avoid by using alternative routes
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hebbronville checkpoint: checkpoint on Highway 359 that smugglers attempt to bypass by using alternative routes such as 'the loop'
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 59: highway with a checkpoint that smugglers try to avoid by using alternative routes
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 359: highway with a checkpoint that smugglers attempt to bypass by using alternative routes such as 'the loop'
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Highway 16: highway used by smugglers after avoiding checkpoints
